org.spongepowered.api.text

Class TextTemplate.Arg.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.TextTemplate.Arg.Builder

    TextTemplate.Arg

    public static final class TextTemplate.Arg.Builder
extends Object
    Represents a builder for TextTemplate.Args.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public TextTemplate.Arg build()
        Builds a new TextTemplate.Arg. Note that it is not necessary to call this method when supplying an argument to a template. You may pass the builder to TextTemplate.of(Object...) directly.
        Returns:
        Newly created Arg

      • optional

        public TextTemplate.Arg.Builder optional(boolean optional)
        Sets whether the Arg should be optional (false by default).
        Parameters:
        optional - True if should be optional
        Returns:
        This builder

      • optional

        public TextTemplate.Arg.Builder optional()
        Makes the Arg optional.
        Returns:
        This builder

      • defaultValue

        public TextTemplate.Arg.Builder defaultValue(Text defaultValue)
        Sets the default value for the Argument. The argument must by optional in order for this value to be used.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - Default value
        Returns:
        This builder

      • format

        public TextTemplate.Arg.Builder format(TextFormat format)
        Sets the "base" format of the Arg. This acts as a default format when no formatting data is provided by the parameter.
        Parameters:
        format - Base format of Arg
        Returns:
        This builder

      • color

        public TextTemplate.Arg.Builder color(TextColor color)
        Sets the "base" color of the Arg. This acts as a default color when no color data is provided by the parameter.
        Parameters:
        color - Base color of Arg
        Returns:
        This builder

      • style

        public TextTemplate.Arg.Builder style(TextStyle style)
        Sets the "base" style of the Arg. This acts as a default style when no style data is provided by the parameter.
        Parameters:
        style - Base style of Arg
        Returns:
        This builder

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
